content: आनम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bend, bend down, bow, incline, stoop; <ls>Śi. 1. 13.</ls> {@--2@} To salute (respectfully), bow down to; तमपि राजकमाननाम <ls>K. 59.</ls> {@--3@} To humble. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (नमयति) To cause to bend down; कुचभारानप्निता न योषितः <ls>Bh. 3. 27</ls>; विदर्भपति मानमितं बलैश्च <ls>M. 5. 3</ls> humbled.
